405.title: METHOD_NOT_ALLOWED
405.detail: Requested method is not supported for the requested resource.

400.title: BAD_REQUEST
400.detail: The request cannot be fulfilled due to bad syntax.

401.title: UNAUTHORIZED
401.detail: Authentication failed or not yet been provided.

403.title: FORBIDDEN
403.detail: The request was a legal request, but the server is refusing to respond to it.

404.title: NOT_FOUND
404.detail: The requested resource could not be found but may be available again in the future.

413.title: REQUEST_ENTITY_TOO_LARGE
413.detail: The request is larger than the server is willing or able to process.

500.title: INTERNAL_SERVER_ERROR
500.detail: Server encountered an unexpected condition that prevented it from fulfilling the request.
